message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you get 10. It's a good deal, right?
You could have gotten more in the first round, now it's my turn to make a better offer!
You want to play hardball? Fine. I'll take 70, you get 30. It's a better deal for you than before, and it's more fair than your last offer.
You're being stubborn, but I'm willing to give you a bit more. This is my best offer so far.
